CocoaHeads Brisbane

A monthly Mac & iOS developer meetup
meetup.com/cocoaheads

@cocoaheadsbne
github.com/cocoaheadsbne

We’re a friendly bunch who meet regularly to discuss programming for Mac and iOS. We share the latest news, present projects and tutorials and have a good old chat.

The Brisbane chapter meets on the first Tuesday of every month (except January). Everyone is welcome, so please come along!

November 2013

Our next meetup is on Tuesday 5th November, 2013 at River City Labs, with food and drinks kindly sponsored by GitHub.

Our guest this month is Tom Adams, co-founder and CTO of Oomph. We also have two short talks on Memory Mapping and Core Image by Lachlan and Matt.

There's limited places available, so please remember to RSVP.
